programme.title: Building Generational Wealth
programme.desc: Tamarra Lewis Johnson is a serial entrepreneur who is bringing her children along on her business journey, building wealth across three generations

programme.title: Covering the 2016 North American International Auto Show
programme.desc: Our guest is CEO and Chairman of General Motors Mary Barra, who shares her plans to take car culture to the next level. Then Michael Sprague, COO of KIA Motors, shows off its luxury K900. Then we get an inside look at diversity in the auto industry with The National Association of Minority Automobile Dealers president Damon Lester and Marc Bland, vice president of Diversity & inclusion at IHS Automotive. And finally, we sit down with head of design at FiatChrysler, Ralph Gilles, who gives us a glimpse of the minivan thats making major waves with critics and customers.

programme.title: Keep Up the Fight for Racial Equity
programme.desc: In the face of efforts to kill diversity and inclusion initiatives, expert Natalie Norfus shares what we all must do to protect the progress we’ve made

programme.title: Joy Reid s Next Chapter
programme.desc: Award-winning journalist and bestselling author Joy Reid opens up about the launch of her new podcast, "The Joy Reid Show," just months after the abrupt cancellation of her primetime daily news show, "The ReidOut," on MSNBC. The political analyst also discusses the challenges of building her own media platform and why a growing wave of progressives are leaving the Democratic Party.

programme.title: America s Most Effective Urban Mayor
programme.desc: From reducing crime and gang violence and resolving a lead-pipe/clean water crisis, to leveraging public/private partnerships and campaigning for the creation of model neighborhoods, Newark Mayor Ras Baraka has emerged as one of the nation’s most effective urban mayors—much to the surprise of many. The former high school principal and son of iconic poet and civil rights activist Amiri Baraka joins Beyond The Hype to share insights on his approach to leading New Jersey’s largest city and his bid to become the state’s next governor.

programme.title: NeNe Leakes Under the Bright Lights of Broadway
programme.desc: NeNe Leakes takes us on her journey from being one of the leading personalities on reality TV to making her Broadway debut as “Madam” in Cinderella. We also feature Adenah Bayoh, who after escaping a Civil War in Liberia, grew a multi-million dollar business and became the top employer in her community. She was the youngest person to become a franchisee at IHOP. Get get career advice from Egypt Sherrod, who talks to us about her true passion, and how making the switch from the leading lady in radio, to a real estate maven. She is now redefining her idea of success as host of Property Virgin. And finally we profile Howard University Middle School of Mathematics and Science and the students who graduate with an appreciation in STEM. Yohance Maqubella is the schools executive director.

programme.title: How to Breathe Through Hard Times
programme.desc: Zee Clarke, author of “Black People Breathe,” teaches us how to use the power of our breath in the face of racism and microaggressions

programme.title: Simple Steps To Get Your Debt Under Control
programme.desc: Too much debt is the biggest threat to financial wellness. Financial motivator Ash “Cash” Exantus, Co-Founder and CEO of Mindright Money Management, explains why your mindset and lifestyle determines how you manage debt, and offers valuable actions you can take to get and keep it under control.

programme.title: Elite Military Forces
programme.desc: Examining some of the best-trained, most effective military units in history.

programme.title: Covert Cabal
programme.desc: Dive deep into the details of military technology from around the world.

programme.title: The Armchair Historian 2024
programme.desc: The team at Armchair Historian examine modern warfare in an entertaining and informative way.

programme.title: The Front - The Biggest 'Melting-Pot' Resistance of WW2
programme.desc: Communists, monarchists etc. All combined into one because they kept getting invaded

programme.title: The Front - WW2 Battle for the Atlantic
programme.desc: Part 1 of an epic 2-part video on the Battle of the Atlantic - the most underrated battle of the ENTIRE Second World War. First up, we cover the Battle from September 1939 to December 1941.

programme.title: Mars: Barren Rock or Inhabited Civilization?
programme.desc: Mars has always fascinated humanity. Was there ever life on Mars? Is their life on Mars? This program examines photographic evidence of what appear to be manmade structures on our mysterious neighbor and asks could Mars be a link to another civilization

programme.title: The Armchair Historian 2024

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance

No other program better positions investors and executives for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech
programme.desc: Bloomberg Tech is the only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories. The program brings the audience interviews from the biggest names in the business, offering in-depth analysis and critical insights.

programme.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
programme.desc: "Bloomberg Real Yield," is a weekly fixed-income show driven by Bloomberg data and Wall Street analysis. The program covers sovereign and credit markets as investors grapple with fiscal, monetary and financial factors. Each week guests from major bond companies join us to give their insight and perspective on how to trade the global headlines.

programme.title: High-Rise
programme.desc: Tom Hiddleston stars as Dr. Robert Laing, the newest resident of a luxurious apartment in a high-tech skyscraper whose lofty location places him amongst society's upper class.

programme.title: No No: A Dockumentary
programme.desc: A celebration of the life and times of major league pitcher Doc Ellis, the notorious no-hitter he pitched high on LSD, and his story of overcoming addition. Its a trip.

programme.title: Phoenix Lights: UFO Flyovers or Military Test Flights?
programme.desc: The strange sighting over the southwestern United States in March 1997 called the ‘Phoenix Lights’ lasted for three hours. Investigators found no plausible explanation. This program presents new footage of the Phoenix Lights that continue to appear.

programme.title: Egyptian Pyramids: Architectural Wonder or Alien Engineering?
programme.desc: The Pyramids of Egypt are among the largest structures ever built. Archeologists and researchers have determined ancient Egypt lacked the tools and skills required to build the pyramids. So how did the Egyptians build them over four thousand years ago?

programme.title: Horror Machine | A Serial Killer’s Revenge
programme.desc: A small time reporter attempts to assist the suicide of a parolee for the convicted killer story of a lifetime, but can he trust a man who was once a cold blooded killer?

programme.title: Angel Maker: Serial Killer Queen
programme.desc: In the 19th century, England controlled the biggest Empire the world had ever seen. Scientific breakthroughs, huge scale engineering, and great leaps in medicine led Britain's reign of global power. And yet, behind the facade there was a darkness. An unimaginable world of evil - theft, rape, murder and more. This was the real world of Jack the Ripper and Sherlock Holmes. But there was a lesser known killer on the loose who was far worse than any of the others, a woman who would succeed in becoming one of the world's most prolific serial killers. Her name was Amelia Dyer and she killed over 400 innocent babies. A seemingly gentle old lady, Amelia would take in children under the guise of nurturing and caring for them when in reality she starved and strangled them to death. Explore inconceivable recesses of humanity in this shockingly true story of human darkness and depravity at the turn of the century.

programme.title: Mountain Meadows Nature Film - New 3 Hour Version!

Runtime 2 hours 53 minutes.

programme.title: Preview for Journey Through Alaska
programme.desc: Experience the magnificence of the Alaskan wilderness in "Journey Through Alaska". The full 90 minute film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv on August 22, 2023.

programme.title: Journey Through the English Countryside
programme.desc: Glide over the lush green landscapes, white sea cliffs, and castle ruins on this remarkable journey through Englands beautiful countryside, villages and castles. Spectacular cinematography and photography are accompanied by a relaxing soundtrack. Run Time 86 minutes. This full length film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: Katy Perry vs. Russell Brand
programme.desc: S1:E7 Katy Perry is no stranger to toxic relationships. She finally thought she landed the perfect one with bad boy comedian Russell Brand, only for him to divorce her through text message right in the middle of her world tour 2 years later. Our team uncovered the full story of the turbulent aftermath and the journey she went on to become a strong, authentic person who was finally able to fully embrace a healthy relationship.

programme.title: Winona Ryder vs. Johnny Depp
programme.desc: S1: E10 Johnny Depp’s trial with Amber Heard had everyone talking, but wait until you hear about Winona Ryder’s. Johnny experienced love at first sight and became obsessed with Winona. But after their breakup, Winona dealt with mental health issues and her own very public trial, which has some striking similarities with Johnny and Ambers. Everyone thought she was a crazy, and the aftermath of her court case left her banished from the world. Winona went through a great awakening outside of the public eye and bounced back into Hollywood.

programme.title: The Kardashians vs. Jordyn Woods
programme.desc: S1:E4 Jordyn Woods was somebody the Kardashian family trusted. But all that changed when rumours of her being a home wrecker emerged after a scandalous yet confusing night at a party with Khloé Kardashian’s then-boyfriend and NBA player, Tristan Thompson. Our team investigated both sides of the story and got the real truth about what happened that night.

programme.title: Terry Crews My Biggest Regret
programme.desc: For years Terry Crews was terrified of his alcoholic father. Decades later, Terry finally confronts him about his childhood. But why does it become his biggest regret?

programme.title: Misdiagnosed - Every Mother s Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Victoria felt a pain in her abdomen. Doctor’s said she was faking it and then the unthinkable happened. She began to deteriorate and ended up completely paralyzed. She was a prisoner in her own body, trapped inside capable of hearing everything but incapable of responding. Doctors gave up but her mother never lost hope. That hope kept her alive and her story has captured the nation’s attention.

programme.title: Real Stories With Wim Hof
programme.desc: In this bonus exclusive Goalcast interview, find out what Wim Hofs mother said to him at a very young age that drives every move he makes. Wim Hof is a world record breaker and a global phenomenon. He is famous for his superhuman ability to perform extreme long-distance swimming under freezing water. But the Iceman believes he has a special calling in the world.

programme.title: Lopez Lomong The Olympian Lost Boy
programme.desc: He went from running for his life to running to represent his country, seeing the worst human cruelties to life’s biggest blessings, and enduring years of hopelessness to experiencing the most fulfilling accomplishments. Lopez Lomong’s story proves what we can achieve if we make the most of the opportunities life gives us.

programme.title: Chadwick Boseman Live Your Purpose
programme.desc: Chadwick Boseman lived a life of humility and service on and off screen. He didnt let his diagnosis stop him from showing up for those around him and using his platform to elevate black voices. A true hero, he made every day count.

programme.title: Mia Kang The Woman That I Am
programme.desc: Overweight as a child, Mia Kang suffered bullying and a far from ideal childhood. Desperate to lose weight and feel good about herself, Mia began starving herself at the young age of 13. She lost a lot of weight very quickly and this launched her into the modeling industry which continued to destroy her self-esteem and health, until a vacation in Thailand, and her discovery of Muay Thai changed her life forever.

programme.title: Daryl Davis Did the Unthinkable
programme.desc: Daryl Davis was determined to understand why he was hated for the color of his skin. His pursuit for answers brought him face to face with the leader of the KKK. Find out how one conversation is changing history in real time.

programme.title: Terry Crews My Biggest Regret
programme.desc: For years Terry Crews was terrified of his alcoholic father. Decades later, Terry finally confronts him about his childhood. But why does it become his biggest regret?

programme.title: Dr. Edith Edgar Dancing with the Devil
programme.desc: Holocaust survivor Edith Eger breaks her silence on her terrifying experience as a teenager at Auschwitz. Learn how she reclaimed her story and found her voice.

programme.title: Pardeep Kaleka Empathy - The Path From Darkness to Light
programme.desc: This is the remarkable story of Pardeep Kaleka, a faithful Sikh believer, and his quest to track down his fathers killer. In his search for truth, he bonded with a former White Supremacist. What did they have in common? And how did their friendship transform lives around the world? Forgiveness is a powerful tool to heal ourselves, connect deeply, and truly make our world better. Who do you need to forgive today?

programme.title: 10x Your Life
programme.desc: Author, entrepreneur, and sales savant, Grant Cardone, breaks down the power of his 10X Rule and how you can use it to multiply your success.

programme.title: From Thief to Self-Made Millionaire
programme.desc: Watch John Assarafs personal story of growth, the lessons he learned early on in life, and how he went from robber to self-made millionaire by brushing his teeth.

programme.title: Integrity or Nothing
programme.desc: This is how the worlds biggest music manager, Scooter Braun, climbed out of his rock-bottom to make it to the top. What started as sweat, tears and hustle blossomed into a life of generosity and compassion, all because of one important piece of wisdom from his father.

programme.title: Medicare Signups
programme.desc: Signing Up for Medicare can be a Stressful Process. We get BOMBARDED with tons of TV Commercials and Medicare Mail. This information Overload can make it feel overwhelming trying to make the choice that best fits your situation. In this Video our goal is to help cut through all the Medicare Scams and Financial Traps and bring you the TRUTH so you can become a Medicare Master.

programme.title: WARNING This Medicare Surcharge is Going Up in 2024
programme.desc: Today, Marvin Musick from Medicare School offers a clear and detailed explanation of Medicares costs and surcharges set for 2024. Marvin reveals the Medicare expenses, countering the common misconception that its a free or minimal-cost service. He outlines the various financial components involved in Medicare, such as premiums, deductibles, co-pays, co-insurance, and the distinctive excess charges. Marvin details Medicare Part A, Medicare Part B, Medicare Part C (Advantage Plans), and Medicare Part D (Prescription Drugs), pinpointing the standard fees and the extra charges that individuals with higher incomes might encounter. He explains the Income-Related Monthly Adjustment Amount (IRMAA) and how it relates to the Medicare surcharges.

programme.title: Cadillac Vistiq 2025 The Future of American Luxury
programme.desc: "Step into the future with the 2025 Cadillac Vistiq, a cutting-edge electric SUV redefining luxury and innovation. In this episode, we explore its sleek design, advanced technology, and impressive performance capabilities. Discover how Cadillac is leading the charge in the EV revolution while staying true to its legacy of elegance and sophistication."

programme.title: The New Scout A Trailblazer Reimagined
programme.desc: "Explore the newest Scout truck, an iconic name reborn for the modern adventurer. From its rugged design to cutting-edge technology, we break down what makes this truck a standout in the off-road and lifestyle vehicle market. programme.title: Life on the Mississippi
programme.desc: Most mid-19th-century Mississippi River boys dreamed of occupying that pinnacle of power and glamour, the pilot house of a riverboat. In a riot of local color, this film tells how, unlike many, Sam's dream comes true. A callow teenager, he talks the tough but consummate Horace Bixby into making him his apprentice on the "Paul Jones," eventually following him to the much finer "Aleck Scott." Meanwhile, he is already spinning fantastic yarns to everyone from awe-struck lads ashore, to fellow "cub pilots", to young lady passengers who catch his eye. Things temporarily take a turn for the worse when Bixby must attend a meeting and leave Sam to work under Brown, a dour tyrant with a grudge against him.

programme.title: At 23,000 Feet
programme.desc: What does it take to reach the top of the world? A question everyone once in their life always thinks After creating the first world record of fastest climb on Black Peak Mountain which is at an altitude of 6387 meters in 6 days, Kovid Mittal is all set to climb 23000 feet mountain, his last chapter before he climbs Mount Everest, but will he be able to climb this 23000 feet monster despite his little to no experience ? A Journey of a young boy battling his own emotions and demons in hope that one day he shall climb Mount Everest.

programme.title: Spotlight - Nisa Amoils, Managing Partner at A100x Ventures
Spotlight - Nisa Amoils, Managing Partner at A100x Ventures
Innovating Crypto Adoption: The Role of Payment Methods and User Experience
programme.desc: Join us in this exciting special short episode made at the Input Whispers: Jazz and Cigars event in Singapore, as part of a media partnership with Input PR where we sit down with Konstantins Vasilenko, the co-founder and Chief Business Development Officer of Paybis, a fiat-to-crypto gateway serving individuals and businesses across 180 countries. Discover the exciting world of crypto as Konstantins shares insights on the challenges first-time users face when trying to buy or use cryptocurrency. He discusses the importance of simplifying the onboarding process and how Pabus is working to make it as easy as purchasing everyday items online. We also dive into the differences in payment methods across various regions, the evolving regulatory landscape in Europe and the U.S., and the intersection of banks, fintechs, and crypto gateways. Konstantins highlights the growing trend of crypto debit cards and the adoption of stablecoins in traditional finance, showcasing how these innovations can speed up global crypto adoption.

programme.desc: The championship heads into Round 8 with tension running high and every point counting. Watch the continent’s fastest young drivers battle through tight corners and high-speed straights in another thrilling showcase of raw karting talent and precision racing.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship
programme.desc: It’s the final push of the season as Round 9 delivers intense wheel-to-wheel action and championship-level drama. The best in European karting give it everything in a high-stakes showdown where consistency, courage, and control make all the difference.

programme.title: SnowMobilerTV
programme.desc: On this episode of STV, Jeff finds a golden nugget at SledARama and the crew hits the trails of Sudbury, Ontario.

programme.title: The 900 Series
programme.desc: Blake performs a leakdown test on a 996 that won't start and then discovers metal flakes in the oil filter; Tony visits the Mecum Auction

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Chris entered his local rally and decided to make it even harder by doing it on a Royal Enfield Himalaya 450, Chris takes the Triumph Scrambler 400X to some of our favourite roads and trails, skids and wheelies mandatory!

programme.title: Sams Garage
programme.desc: Sam installs a new camshaft from Summit Racing in a 1976 Nova

programme.title: Michelin 24H Series
programme.desc: Endurance racing returns to Spain as the 24H Series heads to the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya for Round 6. Teams push through relentless stints, strategy calls, and changing conditions in a true test of durability, teamwork, and precision driving.

programme.title: Start Small
programme.desc: Bigger is not always better! Start out with a manageable project when you want to learn a new technique. Joanne Banko appears first with a simple quilted tote. Learn the basics of an easy quilt square, and then use the technique to create a basic tote. Next, Paula Reid shares tips for working on a large project such as a bed quilt -- just how do you work with all of that fabric on your machine? Last is Angela Wolf with techniques for quilting leather and fleece for warmth and style.

programme.title: Off Our Needles
programme.desc: Hold onto your needles! Tracie and Jodi, are here to dish out fresh fiber inspiration. From project picks to wooly good gossip, things are about to get super knitty… and maybe just a little nutty.

programme.title: Fly Away
programme.desc: Let's make wings and fly. With paper, scissors and a little spaghetti, Jenny Barnett-Rohrs makes paper feathers. Then, she crafts fuzzy bug wings from felt. Artist Franz Spohn illustrates distance and perspective in his drawings of birds in flight. Jenny crafts a bird house for our feathered friends.

programme.title: Growing and Building
programme.desc: Living things inspire us to create and to craft. Jenny and Katie craft together to make a special pot decorated with glittery sea creatures. Franz takes art outdoors as he designs, lays out and plants a character image for the garden. Bloggers share great ideas for creating a cactus that won't be prickly or making a quick and easy super turtle figure. Katie shows how to create colorful greeting cards and artwork for family and friends then uses supplies in the Family Craft Box to erect buildings or make whimsical bug cars.

programme.title: Color Bracelets
programme.desc: Make a memorable color story with designer and author Ashley Bunting. She uses memory wire and parachute cord to make trendy beaded bracelets. Katie shows how to organize your work space with the right storage, work surface and lighting on the Beading Lesson.

programme.title: Wire It Up
programme.desc: The right tools can unleash your creativity. Designer Brenda Schweder shows how to make wire frames and captures on a stationary jig. Illusion-style necklaces with crystals are easy and quick to make using tips and tricks from Katie's Beading Lesson.

programme.title: Episode 8: Travel
programme.desc: Set off in new directions. Julie Fei-Fan Balzer creates a travel journal with painted images. Cheryl Boglioli makes a handy caddy for creating on the road. Joe Rotella has a tip for keeping track of unmounted rubber stamps. Ashley Horton saves the most delicious travel memories on stenciled pages.

programme.title: Mavericks
programme.desc: Certain artists are known for pushing the envelope -- they are the innovators or mavericks of the art world. We begin today with Jackson Pollock, an abstract impressionist known for his drip painting which we'll give a try. Then Joe Rotella our own maverick creates coral from film -- a pretty interesting technique. Then Cheryl Sleboda is up next with art as wearables and paldrons created for cosplay. We finish up with Candie Cooper as she cuts up cookie tins to make earrings.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show
programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.title: Blue
programme.desc: Jamal and Amiel's connection is revealed, as well as Amiel's transformation into Yussuf, who's struggling with the consequences of terrorism against Israel. Iris and Haim learn about Stockholm Syndrome. Yael's belongings are stolen from storage.

programme.title: A Ghost from the Past
programme.desc: Iris and Haim discover new details tying Amiel, Atar Shorer and Dr. Ze'ev together. Dr. Ze'ev is busy skillfully training Yinon. Nimrode's violent deterioration continues. An interested Dr. Ostrovsky offers a depressed Talia a ray of light.

programme.title: The Song
programme.desc: Atar recruits Yinon. Haim and Iris uncover Operation Judas. Nimrode spends an emotionally charged evening with Michaela. Talia meets a younger man. Abdullah and Yussuf prepare for a terrorist act, but Abdullah is skeptical of Yussuf's motivations.

programme.title: The Picture
programme.desc: The mystery of the picture of the man and his two children continues to trouble Uri, who investigate with Iris. Both Abdullah and Layla continue to snoop around about Yussuf. Dana flirts with Oren. Nimrode struggles at Michaela's dinner party.

programme.title: Magic Mummy (1933)
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are police officers, driving around in their car and enjoying listening to some music on their police radio, when they hear a bulletin announcing another theft of a mummy from the local museum. They stumble upon the culprit, a mysterious and ghoulish man who is carrying a coffin through a secret door in a cemetery. They sneak in after him and watch him command the mummy to life; it is a beautiful woman, who he then commands to sing for his audience of skeletal theatre-goers. Tom and Jerry break up the evening and try to escape with the stolen goods, with mixed results.

Even Trade - When no deals a good deal.

programme.title: HAIGHT ASHBURY: THE BEAT OF GENERATION
programme.desc: In a brief four-year span in the late 1960s, a creative movement emerged that would ignite a musical genre in a quaint San Francisco neighborhood less than a mile square. What would come to be coined the San Francisco Sound served as the soundtrack for a counter-culture revolution that would forever challenge the perception of the American ideal. This movement climaxed in a single California season known as the Summer of Love in a neighborhood that provided a canvas for this artistic burst of imagination: Haight-Ashbury.

programme.title: YOU BURY YOUR OWN

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 15
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: Shopping Mad
programme.desc: Its shopping time! Don and Colonel move the trolley up the aisles, little do they know that the three mice are peeping from between Don’s bag. Chaos unfolds in the mall!

programme.title: Smells Like Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Space-whale
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: Game On
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: APPRENTICE ALERT
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in his inventive mood and rigging up a new treat for his customers. In streak Basha chased by Sundar and the two mess around the kitchen while Chai Raja has stepped out for a second. As he tosses stuff to keep Sundar at bay, Basha accidentally makes a couple of special jalebis. Chai Raja steps back in and the two freeze mid-motion. Chai Raja scoops out the simmering jalebis and sniffs, his nose wrinkling. Sundar eagerly points at Basha sure that the monkey is sure to get in trouble this time, but much to his chagrin, Basha is hired- as an apprentice!! As Sundar glumly waits at the tables, Basha (the show-off) not only builds an acrobatic rapport with Chai Raja and makes life miserable for Sundar, but also manages to gobble up fries on the sly. Sundar has to find some means of getting Basha fired and tries to sneak in and mess with Bashas batter. But he ends up only making it better and earning Basha more pats on his back. The MP arrives and Chai Raja wants to show off his new apprentices skills Basha is in the spotlight and sure to crack under the heat. Sundar, meanwhile ready to be rid of Basha in any manner possible, sticks dynamite in the batter. Basha, stumped as to what to cook , hastily shapes up the batter into an inviting cake. Seeing a wick, the MP lights it- and slices...KABOOM! Both Basha and Sundar, trod with heavy shoulders out the tea stall as a charred Chai Raja signals they are fired.

programme.title: GIVEAWAY
programme.desc: The Elders assign lots of chores to the Guardians. To get them to mellow out, Pai prepares a special dish. They become so mellow they start giving away all their possessions. Seeing an opportunity, Negu sends his henchmen to ask for the Glove of the North. Koto and Amkko fail, so Negu sends Mei and the Mutant Raccoon in disguise. The Mutant Raccoon ends up smashing himself in the face with the nunchucks given to Pai by the Elders.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: TRING TRING
programme.desc: The days are getting busier at the hotel and the constant running around and hauling plates etc is getting to Sundar. He just wishes he could quickly finish up and snooze the rest of the time. After an especially hectic day of waiting/cleaning, Sundar cant believe his luck when he finds an old busted cycle near the backyard of the Hotel. With a little tinkering (taking parts out), Sundar manages to change it into a unicycle that will help him clean up and wait tables faster. What Sundar doesnt expect is that balancing on a unicycle can be quite a tricky issue he botches up the deliveries badly and Chai Raja orders him to get rid of the unicycle. Sundar does so with a heavy heart but imagine his surprise when the next day morning he wakes up to a familiar bell- its the unicycleits back and Basha is on it. What hurts more is that Chai Raja is encouraging it as Basha on the unicycle is helping amp up the customer flow. Sundar wants his unicycle back not only because he believes it should him getting the applause but also because the nifty Basha is using the unicycle performance as a faade to stealing fritters. Sundar and Basha have a showdown and Sundar getting carried away, performs with such a frenzy that ultimately he crashes the pantry down. The final shot is off Sundar cleaning up the mess wearing the cycle tire as a reluctant garland.

programme.title: Mini Fix
programme.desc: Colonel is building a HUGE MINIATURE city out of LEGO-like blocks. There are trees and roads and houses with windows and tall buildings and a hospital and a police station and prison and pools. Now what could go wrong here???

programme.title: I Love My Family the Most
programme.desc: A boy who likes to swim falls into the sea and sinks. There are many delicious foods in the fairy castle in the sea that saved the boy, but the boy misses his family on land.

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: THE SAND WITCH
programme.desc: The Clean Bee has stolen all the sand from the beach to build herself a massive and very clean hive-castle.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: GOOD CROC, BAD CROC!
programme.desc: The Guardians enjoy a baby croc until it grows into an unmanageable mutant sent by Negu. They’ll need to train the croc, and then return it to the island Negu stole it from.

programme.title: NOW YOU TEA ME
programme.desc: Basha sits plotting his next move to divest the snack shelf off more kachoris when he is surprised to find his banana mocktail being drained by someone invisible. Basha soon finds out its a chameleon with a super camouflage- and the best part? If Basha too touches it, for a short while, he too can camouflage to merge with the immediate surrounding! Basha rushes to use the chameleon as to grab the kachoris. Sundar is indeed stumped for a while as he sees the kachoris magically disappear and pranks magically make him stumble and mess up the order. But then he hears Bashas chuckle and staying hidden, finds out Bashas secret. Sundar immediately tricks the chameleon out of Bashas hands and voila! Now Sundar is camouflaging. Gleefully, Sundar just starts exacting revenge when to his horror, he finds that the chameleon is an even bigger thief than Basha who is guzzling the tea as well as snacks set for the customers. Chai Raja who catches a glimpse of Sundar camouflaging after touching the chameleon and then watches the snacks and tea disappearing immediately suspects him. Sundar must now clear his image quick else he will be cleared out of Hotel California once and for all.

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: I Lee
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: 51 Follow The Dots
programme.desc: When Pancake can’t resist opening a box of polka dots, the dots escape and cover the Zooniverse. Understanding that there are reasons for rules.

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: Honey bees Attack
programme.desc: Cat is relaxing in a hammock under the coconut trees at the back of the house reading a newspaper item of an exotic insect whose sting can kill.

programme.title: BIG BALL OF PUPA
programme.desc: The ninjas investigate the strange phenomenon of objects disappearing from Peelville streets while Seb deals with a fear of bugs.

programme.title: The baby dromedary
programme.desc: The twins help a little pharaoh to find his lost pet, a baby dromedary.

programme.title: The liquorice touch
programme.desc: The twins encounter Liquorice, a girl who turns everything she touches into something sweet. After a moment of enthusiasm they discover that she is not so happy about her talent

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: BOLT-ADE
programme.desc: Peelville is plagued by a lightning-charged beverage that is the latest weapon in the arsenal of an intergalactic megalomaniac.

programme.title: Hill Resort
programme.desc: Dunky, Keet and Cat arrive at a nearby hill station with GrandPA for a small holiday, just in time to realize that the local monkeys are not so friendly. A mad chase follows between the monkeys and the three of them .

programme.title: 52 The Zoonigames
programme.desc: Pancake is disheartened when Odessa beats him at a game, but after playing a series of games in the Zooniverse, he learns there’s something even more important than winning-or-losing. Playing games is not about winning or losing but bout having fun!

programme.title: Three's A Pain
programme.desc: When Pancake, Odessa, and Maple end up getting into a tiff over some colored chalk they’re using to draw pictures with, they ALL wind up in the Zooniverse at the same time that night! Sharing is caring. / Teamwork is the way.

programme.title: Makeup Whose Mind
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t decide which Zoonicorn stuffy to take with her on a weekend trip, she ends up having a competition in the Zooniverse between the real Zoonicorns to see who to choose. It’s not whether you win or lose, but how you play the game.

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: The Heroes’ Path
programme.desc: Xia is bored because it’s been days since Negu sent a Mutant when he finds the instructions for the “Heroes’ Path”. Pai and April laugh at what they think is a silly game for kids, but Xia completes each step with great excitement. When one of the instructions is to steal the Glove of the North, Xia begins to suspect something. Thanks to his quick wits he manages to save the Glove of the North and find out who was behind the “Heroes’ Path” – a mutant fox, sent by Negu.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: There's no place like home
programme.desc: The twins meet a lizard who doesn’t like the place where she lives and is convinced that other animals are luckier than her. When they help her settle in the “perfect” place, the lizard realizes what she’d be missing if she left home.

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: April’s Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: “Cuppa” Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: Afraid of the dark
programme.desc: In a northerly winter world, the twins meet a snowman who is afraid of the dark -- and too scared to travel through the night to enjoy the Northern Lights with his friends.

programme.title: The Gigantic Turnip
programme.desc: A gigantic turnip grows in the fields of the peasant GoGo grandpa. He tries to pull out an enormous, heavy turnip with the help of grandma, cats, and mice.

programme.title: Cat Romance
programme.desc: Its a lovely morning suddenly gone berserk as Cat comes charging in to catch Keet. He opens his jaw wide open when he stops…viola …a beautiful white kitten with big dapping eyelashes and eyes as blue as the clear ocean

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: The Secret Book – Sleeping Beauty Case 2
programme.desc: Sandra and her assistant, Fo, travel into the story of “The Sleeping Beauty”, having been called out by the three good fairies. The Prince has been turned to stone by a mysterious spell, just when he was about to reach the castle, where he would kiss her, thus waking her up. The three fairies have tried to break the spell with their magic wands, but to no avail. Sandra will soon discover that the culprit is the Evil Fairy, who gets her spells from a secret book. Only if they can get hold of that book will the three fairies be able to bring the Prince back to life. Plucking up all their courage, Sandra and Fo will enter the evil fairy’s sinister castle in search of the mysterious secret book.

programme.title: The Deep Freeze
programme.desc: After not following the steps to find Odessas hidden treasure, a frustrated Pancake enters the Zooniverse to find it covered in ice and snow. To "turn back on" Mt Zoonihorn, he must follow the steps and learn from his friends mistakes. Determination and following the correct steps can lead to success.

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: Kidnap Mayhem
programme.desc: One night a group of Bandits come to GrandPAs house to kidnap him. In a scheme of confusions the bandits manage the kidnap and arrive at a lonely warehouse on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: Water Of Life – Shoemaker & The Elves
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO are called out by a SHOEMAKER, from the story of the “Elves and the Shoemaker”, by the Brothers Grimm. The elves have gone mad and have extraordinary strength; they have destroyed the SHOEMAKER’s workshop and the town hall. Then, they went into the town arsenal and are about to set light to all the gunpowder. The entire town is in danger. SANDRA and FO will have to unravel the mystery of the elves’ madness and find the Water of Life, the only antidote to turn the dangerous elves back into their usual affable, hard-working selves.

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: Better Than You
programme.desc: Pancake must come to terms with not being better at something than his little sister Maple, which is mirrored in the Zooniverse when he tries to help the Zoonicorns build Jiggly Stone wall. Even when you’re not the best at something, you can always be helpful.

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: The Red Button
programme.desc: Fred insists Brains let him watch over her lab while she visits her father’s Space Station. She agrees under one rule: “Don’t press the red button.” The entire time she’s gone, he can think of nothing else.

programme.title: Fred’s Close Shave
programme.desc: Fred wishes he could look older, so Nora would like him as much as her pop star crush “Romeo Romero.” When he learns about the hair growth bugs that made Brains grow a beard-- he purposely uses them on himself. Now, whenever Friday shaves it off their beards, they grow back longer!

programme.title: Smile Like An Angel
programme.desc: Duda y sus amigos deciden hacer pareja para ir a una expedición. Scot sugiere hacer una votación y el amigo que no sea elegido tiene que ser socio de un espantapájaros. Desafortunadamente para Scot, termina con el espantapájaros. De vuelta a casa, Scot se pregunta por qué es tan impopular. Con un poco de ayuda de Piggy and Puggy y su invento el Smile Ha-ha, Scot se transforma en un "ángel sonriente" y hace que los hermanos búho anuncien a todo el mundo su nueva y mejorada personalidad. Duda corre a Scot para verlo por sí mismo, y termina causando estragos en el escondite de Scot. Scot casi explota de rabia y le ordena a Duda que se vaya. Sorprendentemente, Duda le dice a todo el mundo lo agradable y divertido que era Scot y todos aparecen en la puerta de Scot. ¿Conseguirá Scot finalmente un compañero para la próxima expedición?

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.desc: Dasha, una rica chica mimada, pierda la memoria en un accidente planeado por su novio y su mejor amiga.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: The Paneless Window Washer 1937
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: Pudgy and the Lost Kitten 1938
programme.desc: Pudgy and the Lost Kitten

programme.title: Aladdin and His Wonderful Lamp- 1939
programme.desc: Working in the story department of Surprise Pictures, Olive Oyl writes a script based on the story of Aladdin, casting Popeye as the thief and herself as the Princess

programme.title: Greek Mirthology 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is trying to get his nephews to eat their spinach, so he tells them about how Hercules (Popeye) defeated a bully (Bluto). Hercules gets his strength by sniffing garlic; he wins numerous tests of strength against the bully until the bully spots him sniffing garlic. The bully pulls out a handy bottle of chlorophyll and douses the garlic, disabling Hercules. He then knocks him into a field of spinach where Hercules discovers a new and better source of strength.

programme.title: My Favorite Duck 1942
programme.desc: Porky tries to relax on a hunting and fishing trip, but Daffy, smugly pointing out the "No Duck Hunting" signs, subjects him to constant irritation. Then the "Duck Hunting Season Open" signs start going up.

programme.title: Nearly Weds 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto both plan to marry Olive Oyl, but Popeye proposes first. When Olive says, "Yes!" to Popeye, Bluto sets out to make Popeye look bad, break up the wedding, and win Olive over.

programme.title: Superman: Eleventh Hour- 1942
programme.desc: While Clark Kent is in wartime Japan, Superman becomes a saboteur.

programme.title: Superman: Billion Dollar Limited-1950
programme.desc: Superman battles train robbers seeking to steal a billion dollars worth of gold.

programme.title: Gripes-1943
programme.desc: Private Snafu learns the hard way about the need for military dicipline and procedures to maintain an effective army.

programme.title: Play Safe -1936
programme.desc: A little boy jumps on a real train and learns a lesson about safety.

programme.title: Felix Doubles for Darwin- 1924
programme.desc: A famished Felix reads an advertisement telling of a large reward for anyone that can give proof for the theory of evolution. He hurries to South Africa via Transatlantic Cable and interacts with the local animals. He angers a troop of monkeys by telling them why he's there (they're offended he would suggest they could be related to humans) and they chase him back through the cable to America

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: Dog Gone South 1950
programme.desc: Ever in search of a master, no matter how unwilling, Charlie winds up on a plantation down South and tries to force himself on the owner, a Confederate Colonel. Unfortunately, the Colonel already has a pet bulldog, "Belvedere."

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: Popeye Meets Sinbad the Sailor 1936
programme.desc: The legendary sailors Popeye and Sindbad do battle to see which one is the greatest.

programme.title: The Return of Mr. Hook -1945
programme.desc: Seaman Hook has big plans for after the war, mostly involving rushing home and marrying his sweetie. So do his fellow seaman, but theirs involve buying bond

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Page Miss Glory 1936
programme.desc: A bellhop in the No 1. hotel of a smalltown awaiting the arrival of Miss Glory dreams he has to page Miss Glory at a first class hotel in New York, and this turns out to be a nightmare. Finally he is awakened by the manager, because Miss Glory's car has arrived, but instead of a beautiful lady, a child star a la Shirley Temple steps out ...

programme.title: The Bashful Bachelor-1942
programme.desc: Lum Edwards is annoyed with his partner in Pine Ridge's Jot-'em-Down general store, Abner Peabody, because Abner has swapped their delivery car for a racehorse. Lum is also too timid to propose to Geraldine, so he involves Abner in a "rescue" effort which nearly gets both of them killed. They try again, and this time Geraldine is impressed. Lum writes a proposal note, but Abner, by mistake, delivers it to the Widder Abernathy, who has been ready to remarry for years. This puts Lum in a peck of trouble until the sheriff appears with the Widder's long-gone and hiding husband

programme.title: Midnight Manhunt-1945
programme.desc: In a cheap hotel room in New York City Jelke shoots gangster Joe Wells, takes a package from his pocket and flees.Wells staggers into an alley. On her way to her apartment above a wax museum, Sue Gallagher, a reporter for the Chronicle, finds Wells' body and hides his corpse among the wax-figures in the museum and calls her paper to send a photographer so she can get a scoop on the killing of Wells, who had a $5,000 reward for his capture, dead or alive. Meanwhile, Henry Miggs, the museum owner find the body and is ready to call the police but his handyman, Clutch Tracy tells him to conceal it and avoid suspicion. From this point on it is a game of where-is-the-body....and the stolen South American diamonds Wells was carrying.

programme.title: His Double Life-1933
programme.desc: Priam Farrel is a celebrated artist but a social recluse. When his valet dies of a sudden illness, a mix-up leads to the body being identified as Farrel's. The timid artist then assumes the identity of his former servant, but finds himself faced with constant dilemmas as a result.

programme.title: My Man Geoffrey 1936
programme.desc: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

programme.title: The latest sports that you may have missed!
You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
Stories of the Century S1E3 Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: Railroad detectives Matt Clark (Jim Davis)and Frankie Adams (Mary Castle), with the aid of much stock footage from earlier Republic Pictures films, pursue the vengeful James brothers, Frank (Richard Travis) and Jesse (Lee Van Cleef), who declare war on the law after their young half-brother is killed in a police ambush

programme.title: Oklahoma Terror-1939
programme.desc: Cartwright's racket is to sell a ranch and then have Mason and his men drive the ranchers away so he can resell it. If they want their money back he gives it to them and then has them killed. Jack arrives and learns that Mason and his men are the culprits but that they have a boss. He suspects Cartwright and sets trap to expose him

programme.title: The Squaw Man
programme.desc: Henry, Earl of Kerhill has inherited his family's title and wealth while his cousin James Wingate is forced to survive as a relatively low-ranking military officer. Wingate is in love with Henry's wife Lady Diana Kerhill, but his love is unfulfilled despite a mutual affection between them.

programme.title: Rustlers' Hideout 1945
programme.desc: Bringing a herd of cattle to Dave Crockett, Billy halts before going through the pass where many herds have been rustled. He is right as there are two men after Crockett's ranch and packing plant which will be theirs if Crockett fails to pay off his note. When their attempt to get Crockett's son in financial trouble is broken up by Billy and their men fail to rustle the herd, they then poison the water hole

programme.title: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians 1964
programme.desc: In Santa Claus Conquers the Martians, holiday cheer goes interplanetary when Martians, desperate to bring joy to their children, kidnap Santa and whisk him away to the Red Planet. With the help of two Earth kids and his boundless Christmas spirit, Santa turns the tables on his captors and spreads laughter across the galaxy. Campy, colorful, and brimming with 1960s sci-fi charm, this cult favorite delivers a cosmic dose of yuletide fun.

programme.title: The Shanty Where Santy Claus Lives 1933
programme.desc: In The Shanty Where Santy Claus Lives, a heartwarming Merrie Melodies cartoon, a lonely boy is taken in by Santa on Christmas Eve and whisked away to a magical shanty filled with toys, music, and holiday cheer. As the night unfolds, the child discovers the joy of belonging and the true spirit of Christmas. With lively animation, whimsical gags, and a touching message, this Depression-era short captures both the hardship and hope of the season.

programme.title: Constantine and the Cross 1961
programme.desc: In Constantine and the Cross, the sweeping saga of Rome’s first Christian emperor comes to life. Cornel Wilde stars as Constantine, the warrior who rises from soldier to ruler while the empire is torn by conflict and faith. Guided by a vision of the cross, he embraces a new destiny, leading his legions into battle and laying the foundation for a transformed world. With epic battles, palace intrigue, and timeless themes of belief and power, this historical drama tells the inspiring story of a man who changed history forever.

programme.title: Esther and the King 1960
programme.desc: In Esther and the King, the timeless biblical story unfolds in a lavish tale of courage, love, and destiny. When King Ahasuerus of Persia (Richard Egan) seeks a new queen, the beautiful and humble Esther (Joan Collins) is chosen, unaware that her faith will soon be tested. As a deadly plot threatens her people, Esther must summon her strength to risk everything and protect them. With grandeur, passion, and epic spectacle, this historical drama brings to life one of the Bible’s most inspiring heroines.

programme.title: Then There Were Three
programme.desc: US Army personnel patrolling through Italy during World War 2, are being killed off by an unknown German agent posing as a fellow soldier.

programme.title: Night Of The Living Dead
programme.desc: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the Northeast of the United States.

programme.title: The Steel Claw
programme.desc: A Marine stationed in the Philippines loses a hand in an accident and is discharged from the Corps. When the Japanese invade the Philippines, he is called back into service to rescue a general held by Filipino guerrillas behind Japanese lines.

programme.title: Jesse and Lester 1972
programme.desc: In Jesse and Lester, Gianni Garko and Aldo Sambrell star in a Spaghetti Western with a comedic twist. When rough-and-tumble gunman Jesse teams up with mild-mannered preacher Lester, the unlikely duo sets out to claim an inheritance that could change their lives. But standing in their way are outlaws, double-crosses, and plenty of misadventures on the trail. Blending sharp humor, action, and classic Western style, this buddy adventure proves that opposites can make the wildest partners.

programme.title: Romance on the Range 1942
programme.desc: Roy Rogers brings song and spirit to Romance on the Range! When cattle rustlers stir up trouble on the frontier, Roy saddles up to protect the ranchers and bring the outlaws to justice. Along the way, his courage and charm win more than just gunfights, as romance blossoms under the wide-open skies. With the Sons of the Pioneers providing harmony and plenty of action on the trail, this Western blends music, adventure, and heart in true Roy Rogers style.

programme.title: Then There Were Three
programme.desc: US Army personnel patrolling through Italy during World War 2, are being killed off by an unknown German agent posing as a fellow soldier.

programme.title: The Vampire Bat
programme.desc: When corpses drained of blood begin to show up in a European village, vampirism is suspected to be responsible.

programme.title: Idaho
programme.desc: A deputy sets out to prove that a respected judge, who had once been a criminal, is being framed for crimes committed by a crooked saloon owner

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: In Tulsa, after a rancher dies during a feud with a major oil company, his daughter, driven by revenge, starts digging for oil herself.

programme.title: The Invincible Kung Fu Legs
programme.desc: Tan, a Northern Chinese kung fu expert, kills a man using his lethal bootwork in self defense. He is then hired to train a bratty princess and her servant in kung fu. In the meantime, the brother of the man Tan killed is out for revenge and he'll get him at any cost.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar expert Maxwell De Jong to review the renowned Romeo y Julieta cigar. Together, they dive into its flavor, burn, and craftsmanship, sharing their thoughts on how this classic stick holds up in today's market.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Brian and Chris, the discerning palates behind Burn Rate, turn their attention to the Grandeur Cremo cigar. They'll meticulously analyze its blend, construction, and smoking characteristics, offering their experienced insights into this intriguing offering. Tune in to discover if the Grandeur Cremo delivers on its promise of a refined smoking experience, according to Brian and Chris.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, owner of The Cigar Quarters - Dr. Anthony Grant - helps our host Bryan Baiss rate and review the La Rosa Negra cigar. Join us to find out how this stick stacks up to the rest!

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this "Behind the Blend" episode, Belkys Sanchez, Regional Sales Manager for Crown Heads, shares her journey in the male-dominated cigar industry, covering her territory of Florida, Georgia, and Puerto Rico. She details the history and offerings of Crown Heads and Ozgener Family Cigars, emphasizing their quality and accessible price points, and highlights the Puerto Rican market's preference for larger ring gauges. [cite_start]Sanchez concludes by reflecting on what cigars mean to her: "life, journey, history, culture, and peace," and encourages aspiring sales managers to follow their passions.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: On this episode Ian and I sat down with one of the owners of Tobacco Cabana, Stephen Rast. He has been a cigar and pipe smoker for 00:24:00 years and is a bourbon enthusiast, to say the least. This all lends to what Tobacco Cabana is known for, a great staff that is driven to educate their customers.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: During my visit to Train Car Cigar Bar, Brent and I smoked a RoMa Craft CroMagnon in a Lancero vitola. While smoking this great Texas cigar, Brent poured me a Macallan Edition No. 5.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode, Ian and Joel switch positions and we are joined on set with Stephen Rast. We are all tasting through the Rojas Cigar Specialist Kit Level #1. This is a tasting kit designed to help anyone develop their palate in recognizing tobaccos from different regions.

programme.title: The Burn Down Podcast
programme.desc: The Burn Down Podcast takes on and debunks popular cigar myths, setting the record straight on common misconceptions in the cigar world. Tune in for the truth behind the myths you thought you knew!

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: In this episode of the Creekside Podcast, hosts Dave, Noah, and Connor react to two "top 25 cigar lists" from 2024, starting at number 10 and working their way up, all while smoking a cigar blindfolded. They discuss various cigars from the lists, including the Davidoff Grand Cru Diademas Finas, Aganorsa Anniversario Maduro, Crowned Heads Los Calaveras, My Father No. 4, Plasencia Alma Fuerte Colorado Claro, and Quesada 50th Anniversary Toro, offering their unfiltered opinions and experiences with each. The episode culminates in the reveal of their blind-smoked cigar as the Dunbarton Tobacco and Trust Red Meat Lovers (a 6x60 box-pressed porterhouse), and a lively debate about the merits of "boutique" versus well-known brands on such lists, emphasizing that personal preference in cigars means "there's no right and wrong"

programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 16/11/24:
- Cobertura del @latinamericanfashionsummit: Lucía Ugarte entrevistó a #StefRoitman, #calleypoche, a Samantha (co-fundadora de #LAFS) y además, "La Torres" nos cuenta cómo va el desarollo de su negocio luego de haber ganado el premio de #ChicasGuapasFoundation. - Fuimos al lanzamiento oficial de #Alidya en Argentina y conocemos todos los detalles de su nuevo producto para la prevención y reducción de la #celulitis - En un nuevo episodio de #YoJefa, conocemos la historia de Lorena Sauer, quién emigró de Argentina en los años 2000 y hoy vive en #Miami triunfando con la #decoraciondeinteriores.

programme.title: Fashion Styling con CAMI HOMS + Desfile JORGE REY + Colonia UY + Vitamin Shock | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 26/10/24
- Fashion Styling de #CamiHoms x Flor Baragiani. - Cobertura exclusiva del desfile de Jorge Rey: Hablamos con grandes figuras como #CrisMorena, Fabián Medina Flores, #IsabelMacedo, Mora Furtado, Fabiana Araujo, #CandeCopello ¡y muchos más! - Evento "Colonia en Buenos Aires": hablamos con Pepe Cibrián, Martín de Freitas (Director de Turismo de Colonia) y Belén Francese. - Lanzamiento de Vitamin Shock por CAV: Mario Guevara, su fundador, nos cuenta todo sobre esta línea completamente innovadora para #saludcapilar.
